name: 米尔顿·詹姆斯·琼斯
name_full: 米尔顿·詹姆斯·琼斯 Milton James Jones
introduction: Milton James Jones is a Professional Actor, Director and Screenwriter (goo'roo). He earned his B.A. Degree in Business Administration. His number one passion of being an Director, Actor and Writer is to bring Action, Drama and Love to people all over the world into their homes and local theater. He has casted and directed with many of the biggest names in the industry. He's an EX-NFL wide receiver, Who's tryout camps included the Atlanta Falcons and Dallas Cowboys and competed professionally in the USA track&field events of the 200m, 400m and 4x100 relays. He has attended the nationally known casting Gym in Hollywood, Universal Casting, The kitchen t.v.(Voice over) and many other top notch studios across the country to bloom his craft and performance. He's naturally gifted talent. The sky has no limits to his calling in the entertainment industry. Milton fully credits his Parents Barbara and James Jones for giving him and his other brothers and sister an successful upbringing.
